languages.text: This creature can stun an enemy with an attack for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if that enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.
languages.original_text: Совершая атаку, существо может оглушить противника на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, если этот противник провалит проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This creature can stun an enemy with an attack for 1 round, if that enemy fails a Toughness test.
This creature can stun an enemy with an attack for 1 round if that enemy fails a Toughness resistance test.

This creature can stun an enemy with an attack for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if that enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

This creature can stun an enemy with an attack for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if that enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

languages.text: 此生物的攻击可以眩晕敌人。如果目标未能通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，则会被眩晕一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: This creature can stun an enemy with an attack for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if that enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}可以眩晕敌人。如果目标未能通过坚韧抗性检定，则会被眩晕一{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Esta criatura puede aturdir a un enemigo con un ataque durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} si el enemigo falla una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature can stun an enemy with an attack for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if that enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura puede aturdir a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}ataque{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}asalto{/g} si el enemigo falla una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia.

languages.text: この生物は攻撃で敵を1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、その敵が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、スタン状態にできる。
languages.original_text: This creature can stun an enemy with an attack for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if that enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻撃{/g}で敵を1{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、その敵がタフネス抵抗判定に失敗した場合、スタン状態にできる。

languages.text: Совершая атаку, существо может оглушить противника на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, если этот противник провалит проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature can stun an enemy with an attack for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if that enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}атаку{/g}, существо может оглушить противника на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}раунд{/g}, если этот противник провалит проверку Выносливости на сопротивление.
Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}атаку{/g}, существо может оглушить противника на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}раунд{/g}, если этот противник провалит проверку Выносливости на сопротивление.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur kann einen Gegner mit einem Angriff 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang betäuben, wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} des Gegners misslingt.
languages.original_text: This creature can stun an enemy with an attack for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if that enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur kann einen Gegner mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Angriff{/g} für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}Runde{/g} betäuben, wenn dieser Gegner eine Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit nicht besteht.

languages.text: Cette créature peut attaquer un ennemi et lui infliger l'effet Étourdissement pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} si cet ennemi échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature can stun an enemy with an attack for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if that enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature peut {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attaquer{/g} un ennemi et lui infliger l'effet Étourdissement pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} si cet ennemi échoue à un test lié à la Résistance.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, yaptığı saldırıyla bir düşmanı o düşman {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçemezse sersemletebilir. Etkisi, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
